world.setting: Novapolis, a port city that outsourced services after floods.

factions.Acheron Industries: Contractor that runs traffic, budgets, detention.
factions.Street Radio (Juno): Community station that reads names on-air.

terms.Vault Night: Friday the 13th key rotation, two-hour window.
terms.Mother-of-Needles: Old scheduler now guarding the net.

loreRegistry.title: JOHNNY S—

nodes.text:
Pick how much time you have.
• Short: direct route, fewer scenes.
• Long: more people, more choices, clear requirements.
City Hub — pre-heist. Visit people, prep, then plan the breach.

District Black, 02:13, Friday the 13th, 2077-08-13. The fan rattles. Rain sounds like coins on the sill.

**JOHNNY:** “Nine, it’s Vault Night. Two hours to touch Acheron’s key room. The Ghost Key is live.”

choices.text: “I’m in. Give me the quick plan.”

nodes.text:
Mila opens in a blanket. She fixes scooters for rent money.

**MILA:** “You’re going out? On a bad luck night? Be careful. People vanish.”

choices.text: Tell her you’ll be back by sunrise.
Ask what she’s heard about Acheron.

nodes.text: **MILA:** “Then I’ll keep the hallway light on. Knock twice when you’re back. I’ll put on tea.”

choices.text: Change your mind and ask about Acheron.

nodes.text: **MILA:** “They ran ambulances during the floods. Now they run doors. If a lock has no owner, it’s theirs.”
**JOHNNY:** “Simple: pick a way in. Reach the vault. Take the Ghost Key. Then decide: public proof, sell it back, or keep it. Ask first if you like.”

choices.text: What is the Ghost Key in plain words?

nodes.text: **JOHNNY:** “Crisis contractor that never gave power back. Budgets and jails pass through their systems.”
**JOHNNY:** “A seed that signs truth or lies in their ledgers: who was paid, who was locked up.”
**JOHNNY:** “They rotate keys when people look away. Two-hour window. Tonight.”
**JOHNNY:** “See you on the other side.”

Rust Harbor. Steam and cheap soup. A radio reads names of the missing. **JUNO** wipes a glass.

**JUNO:** “Help you?”

choices.text: Ask what Street Radio needs to go public.
Play corporate; see if a side door appears.

nodes.text: **JUNO:** “Bring names and numbers that don’t crumble when checked. I’ll read them on-air. Twice.”

choices.text: Promise you’ll bring a shard she can verify.

nodes.text: **JUNO:** “Good. I’ll keep a line open. If you can’t reach me, the Civic Mesh can take the load.”
The radio hums as the rain gets louder.

You follow an old fiber line. A tired voice answers.

**MOTHER-OF-NEEDLES:** “I timed buses once. Now I time locks. Why are you here?”

choices.text: Ask how the vault works, simply.
Invite her to ride your signal later.

nodes.text: **MOTHER:** “The vault sits where schedules meet. Say ‘Kore’ when the city blinks; a lane opens.”
**MOTHER:** “If I ride, I blur cameras for half a minute when you whisper ‘Kore.’ Spend it well.”
The old system hums in the dark.
Pre-Heist Prep Board — pick small tasks that help later.

choices.lockedText: Meet Johnny first.
Meet Mila at her door.
Meet Juno and promise a shard.

nodes.text: You mark handholds with chalk and map a quiet drop over the monorail spine.
Johnny’s contact burns a low-tier front-desk pass. It won’t survive a deep scan, but it’ll open one door clean.
Mila hands you thick gloves. “Don’t fry yourself on some stupid hatch.”
Juno saves a narrowband code path. “If you’re trapped inside, call this. But only with proof.”
Plan the breach. Pick a way in. You can grab a kit first.

choices.text: Rooftop: ride the monorail spine; drop to maintenance.
Front: forged pass; small talk; security.

nodes.text: Gear table. One kit only.
Patrol pattern: eleven steps, pause, head turn. Again.

choices.text: Move on the pause; service stair to security.

nodes.text: An enforcer scans your badge. Green. “We hire quiet people. Interested?”

choices.text: Flash your forged pass and walk through.
choices.lockedText: Prep a front-door pass first on the Prep Board.

choices.text: Sign and keep a straight face.
Pretend to think; slide to security.

nodes.text: The old AI hums. “When winter blocks your lane, say ‘Kore.’ If I ride your signal, I can blur cameras for a half-minute when you ask.”

choices.text: Keep it out. Trust your hands.

nodes.text: You balance along the monorail spine. Below, the plaza glows. A maintenance drone clacks by.

choices.text: Zip to the hatch and drop.
Shadow the drone to hatch G-13.
Use your chalk marks to cut a quiet line.
choices.lockedText: Scout the rooftop line on the Prep Board first.

choices.text: Gloves on: grip the hot hatch and slip in.
choices.lockedText: Borrow Mila’s insulated gloves on the Prep Board.

nodes.text: Sewer stink. Your drone follows a fiber line. Timer: nine minutes.
White room. A contract slides across the table. “Deliver the Key. We keep you comfortable.”
Security hub. Glass. Cool air. A side panel says OCCUPIED.

choices.text: Open the cells. Let people run.
Loop the cameras. Call the lift quietly.
Ask Mother-of-Needles to blur cameras for 30 seconds.
choices.lockedText: Invite the AI earlier.

choices.text: Patch Street Radio using the code path.
choices.lockedText: Share radio codes at prep, meet Juno, and carry a shard.
Bring the Ghost Key or a verifiable shard.
Bring a verifiable shard or the Ghost Key.

choices.text: Quick detour: help an injured guard.
Quick detour: glance at a mural.
Quick detour: check the break room.
Quick detour: read a text from Mila.

nodes.text: You whisper “Kore.” Cameras fall half a beat out of sync. Doors breathe. You have a small window.

choices.text: Use the window to move deeper.
Use the window to plant the Data Nuke now (if ready).

nodes.text: Locks click open. A woman grips your sleeve. “If you make it—say our names in the light.” A cracked shard changes pockets.

choices.text: Pocket the shard and run for the lift.

nodes.text: The lift opens. Cold air rolls up from below.
Security hub under alarm. Red bars crawl across the glass; drones pivot and listen.

choices.text: Ask Mother-of-Needles to blur cameras for 30 seconds.
choices.lockedText: Invite the AI earlier.

choices.text: Patch Street Radio from inside (code path).
choices.lockedText: Share radio codes at prep, meet Juno, and carry a shard.
Bring the Ghost Key or a verifiable shard.
Bring a verifiable shard or the Ghost Key.

choices.text: Stand your ground and draw them off.

nodes.text: The vault room is quiet like a church. On a stand hums the Ghost Key.

choices.text: Take a small slice into your head.
Smash the Key. Take raw logs only.
Return to Security Hub to act inside HQ.
choices.lockedText: Alarms are live; use the alert route below.

nodes.text: Sirens start somewhere above. You need an exit and a way to tell the city.

choices.text: Street Radio: bring proof to Juno’s tower.
choices.lockedText: Meet Juno and carry a proof shard.

choices.text: Civic Mesh: anchor proofs at clinics and libraries.
choices.lockedText: You need a verifiable shard to anchor.

choices.text: Sell back to Acheron for a safe life.
choices.lockedText: You need a corporate contact or contract first.

choices.text: Keep it and vanish. Work slow.
Optional decoy: post a tiny note on jndl.dev.
Return to Security Hub to plant the Data Nuke.
choices.lockedText: Bring the Ghost Key (or grab a shard and come back via the lift).

choices.text: Guns up: fight your way out.

nodes.text: You set a small post on a terminal-style site. A quiet wink about spring. Just an easter egg.

choices.text: Hide a playful cipher in the post.

nodes.text: Clinic. Library. Repair co-op. You walk the Civic Mesh and leave proofs where people already gather.

choices.text: Stay visible. Teach people how to check the proofs.
Move fast. Leave instructions and disappear.

nodes.text: Juno’s tower hums. She speaks each name slowly, then again. Callers correct spellings.

choices.text: Guard the signal until the list is done.
Slip out while the city listens.

nodes.text: Stairwell camera clicks. With a stealth kit, you can cross while it turns. Without it, you’ll need a distraction.

choices.text: Glide through on the turn (stealth kit).
choices.lockedText: Requires the stealth kit.

choices.text: Drop a loud battery to pull eyes away (loud kit).
choices.lockedText: Requires the loud kit.

choices.text: Grip the hot bracket with Mila’s gloves and slip by.
choices.lockedText: Borrow Mila’s gloves in prep.

choices.text: Wait for a cleaner with a cart and follow.

nodes.text: A guard is bleeding from a nick on the forearm, scared and hiding it.

choices.text: Patch him with your field kit; ask him to look away.
choices.lockedText: Requires the field med kit.

choices.text: Tell him to breathe and count to ten. Keep walking.

nodes.text: You pass a mural of a girl stepping out of snow into tall grass. The plaque says “Kore.”
Break room. Half a sandwich and a deck of cards. A logbook lists “key ceremonies” on every Friday the 13th.
Service corridor. Your phone buzzes. A short text from Mila: “You okay?”
Break room corkboard. Old photo: a right hand wrapped in silver tape. Caption torn. You’ve seen a hand like that. Somewhere.

choices.text: Pocket a copy; back to the corridor.

nodes.text: Inside HQ, you pull on the quiet threads: payroll, detention rosters, vendor ledgers. A single push and screens blink citywide. Doors fail open. Red lights turn white. Street Radio reads names while the Civic Mesh catches proofs and replicates them. Nobody gets hurt. Systems complain. People walk out.

choices.lockedText: Post the laced decoy on jndl.dev first.

nodes.text:
A small terminal overlays the city feed.

PERSEPHONE: six seeds, six blocks. The checksum hums under your fingertips. The panel prints a path:

jndl.dev → whois alex → kore13

You leave a quiet door open for anyone who knows to knock twice.

choices.text: Close the panel and let the signal bloom.

nodes.text: Executive elevator. A handler waits with a pen. “Sign and this never happened.”

choices.lockedText: Take a corp contract earlier.

choices.text: Trade the Key for amnesty anyway.
Smile, then leak a copy into their clean net.
choices.lockedText: You need a copyable shard to leak.

nodes.text: Rooftop. Rain taps your shoulders. The city hums.

choices.text: Refuse the Key’s whisper. Help slow.
Hand the Key to Johnny. Share the risk.
choices.lockedText: You need to still be in touch with Johnny.

choices.text: Step off and end the noise.
Let the Key finish rewriting you.

nodes.text: The hallway cracks with light. A black-team moves like one body.

choices.text: Use the freed crowd as cover.
choices.lockedText: You didn’t open the cells.

choices.text: Call extraction on the favor you banked.
choices.lockedText: Take the contract earlier.

choices.text: Hold your ground until the mag runs dry.

nodes.title: SELF-ERASE
nodes.text: You choose silence: a step into rain, or letting the Key finish its work inside your head. The city keeps moving. Somewhere, a neighbor locks her door and wonders if you made it home.

nodes.title: CLEANUP
nodes.text: The team in black works fast. The report will say ‘resolved.’ The hallway grows quiet. Outside, buses keep their routes.

nodes.title: SIGNAL BLOOM
nodes.text: Proof spreads by radio and by hand. People compare lists in lobbies. Some doors open. Others take longer. On another Friday the 13th, fewer names go missing.

nodes.title: EXECUTIVE GHOST
nodes.text: You trade questions for a badge that opens any door. Your job becomes keeping other people from doing what you just did.
